Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer - Full Warranty Charvel Joe Duplantier SD2 HH Satin White - Used Joe Duplantier Signature Guitar - Satin White - Used - Description Taking their name from the original Japanese pronunciation of Godzilla, French avant-metal quartet Gojira has cemented itself as one of paramount metal acts of the new-millennium. Led by singer, vocalist, and principal songwriter Joe Duplantier, the band has always dealt in extremes — uncovering light in darkness and finding beauty in heaviness while also searching to expand the sonic palette. Charvel proudly honors Duplantier in 2017 with a new, distinctively elegant and ferocious signature model worthy of those musical pursuits. The Joe Duplantier Signature Pro-Mod San Dimas® Style 2 HH is designed with the latest in Charvel high performance, Duplantier's preferred style and specs, and monster tone equal to his band’s name from dual Duncan Designed™ HB humbucking pickups. The San Dimas Style 2 body is crafted out of nato wood with a specially contoured heel for easy access to the upper reaches of the fingerboard, while the bolt-on nato neck with graphite reinforcement has a smooth oiled back finish and convenient thumbwheel truss rod butt adjust. Other premium features include a 12”-16” compound radius ebony fingerboard with 22 jumbo frets, three-way toggle pickup switching and single knurled control knob (volume) in special placement slightly back from playing position, Charvel compound radius compensated bridge with anchored tailpiece, Charvel locking tuners and black hardware. Features/Specs General Model Name : Joe Duplantier Signature Pro-Mod San Dimas Style 2 HH, Ebony Fingerboard, Satin White Model Number : 2976181398 Series : Artist Signature Models Color : Satin White Body Body Shape : Style 2 Body Binding : 1-Ply Black Body Material : Nato Body Finish : Satin Polyester Neck Neck Material : 1-Piece Bolt-On Mahogany with Graphite Reinforcement Neck Binding : None Scale Length : 25.5" (648 mm) Fingerboard Radius : 12" to 16" Compound Radius (304.8 mm to 406.4 mm) Number of Frets : 22 Fret Size : Jumbo String Nut : Black Plastic Nut Width : 1.6875" (42.86 mm) Truss Rod Nut : Heel-Mounted Spoke Wheel Adjustment Headstock : Telecaster Neck Plate : None Neck Finish : Oiled Fingerboard : Ebony Position Inlays : None Electronics Bridge Pickup : Duncan Designed HB-103B Humbucking Neck Pickup : Duncan Designed HB-103N Humbucking Controls : Master Volume Pickup Switching : 3-Position Toggle: Position 1. Bridge Pickup, Position 2. Bridge And Neck Pickups, Position 3.
